attributes.title: CAUTION VIRUS
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and then all the sudden a rapist & racist cheeto puff lookin dude appeared and i screamed while my phone started getting the worst virus so i threw it off the balcony and it went into the street, im writing this in my notebook!

attributes.title: Asked for my information? CHINA?
attributes.review: The app has a big banner that says “CHINA” and it asks for my info to send directly to “the Chinese man” ?? I am an AMERICAN, how dare this app victimize me like that?? When I refused the offer it took a PICTURE OF ME????

attributes.title: Bad app !!
attributes.review: This app is really bad. It’s very racist not reliable  and I would not recommend anyone downloading it at all !! This app should be removed ASAP because it’s just disturbing.
